name: Rolling Pandas
description:
CONTROLS

Move - WASD

Camera - Hold Right Mouse Button

Recruit Panda - R

Panda Follow - Press F to make recruited pandas follow you and press F again to make all pandas stop following you.

Smash Rocks - Hold shift to to sprint at rocks and destroy them. if they don't break, do you have enough pandas in your following? ... and make sure you have a good run up!

Game Objective

Humans have abandoned you in the zoo! Use the collaborative strength of your panda friends you find throughout the game in order to break through rocks and advance through to the end and escape the zoo!  

... there is currently no end to the level so if you make it to the end room ... you have won :) 

made as part of the Ukie Collab Jam.
